org.lenskit.mooc.cbf

Class TFIDFModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.cbf.TFIDFModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Shareable
 @DefaultProvider(value=TFIDFModelProvider.class)
public class TFIDFModel
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The model for a TF-IDF recommender. The model just remembers the normalized tag vector for each item.
    See Also:
    TFIDFModelProvider, Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Double> getItemVector(long item)
      Get the normalized tag vector for a particular item.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getItemVector

        public Map<String,Double> getItemVector(long item)
        Get the normalized tag vector for a particular item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        Returns:
        The item's tag vector. If the item is not known to the model, then this vector is empty.
